column4: Hi there, I'm getting an API mismatch on the NVIDIA kernel module. nv driver also doesn't work, only the VESA driver works atm. Any suggestions?
speak for yourself, it's still crappy old year here ;)
Did you install from apt or did you use the nvidia installer?
> apt one gives error as well, so I deinstalled, and installed latest NVIDIA driver from the nvidia site as it claims it now supports my card :/
